MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DD6 and KY16 postcode areas of Newport-on-Tay and St Andrews. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7:30pm due to faulty overhead line equipment between Vicarsford Pump and Forgan Smithy and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 5:54 PM on Friday, 19 March 2021.
